description: Numbers n such that n*2^n+(n-1) is prime.
comments: The corresponding primes are given in A046848.Next term > 16000. - _Joerg Arndt_, Mar 02 2015
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = isprime(n*2^n+(n-1)); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Oct 12 2014(PARI) for(n=1,10^6,if(ispseudoprime(n*2^n+(n-1)),print1(n,", "))); \\ _Joerg Arndt_, Mar 02 2015
author: _Felice Russo_
